title.narrative: The socio-cultural settings, as well as legislative, political, institutional and organizational frameworks are strengthened and structured to respond to domestic violence against women and girls

description.narrative: The Country Office will jointly engage with national and local stakeholders in structuring actions to speed up the revision of legal texts to make them less discriminatory, improve the institutional response to violence to increase the effectiveness of institutions, change social attitudes and perceptions, improve the delivery of public services in adressing violence, and improve the effectiveness of women's groups in defending women's rights, and the protection of victims

description.narrative: Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - social services (incl youth development and women+ children)
